name: Samsung First Responder Discount
description: Up to 30% off Samsung products for verified first responders
fullDescription: Samsung offers first responders up to 30% off on phones, tablets, TVs, and appliances through their Education Offers Program with ID.me verification.
whatTheyOffer:
- Up to 30% off Samsung phones and tablets
- Discounts on TVs and home appliances
- Combinable with most promotional offers
- Applies to Galaxy smartphones, tablets, watches
- Available to verified first responders
howToGetIt:
1. Visit samsung.com/us/shop/discount-program
2. Select First Responder Program
3. Verify status through ID.me
4. Eligible: police, firefighters, EMTs, paramedics
5. Discount shown on eligible products
keywords: Samsung, first responder, firefighter, police, EMT, 30% off, Galaxy, phone, tablet, TV
